text: Aeneas Soko Chigwedere () (25 November 1939 â€“ 22 January 2021) was a Zimbabwean politician, historian, educationist, and traditional leader. He was the Minister of Education, Sports, & Culture from August 2001 until his death. He became Governor of Mashonaland East Province in August 2008. Chigwedere died on 22 January 2021 after suffering from COVID-19 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Zimbabwean politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Zimbabwe Category:African writers Category:Historians
title: Aeneas Chigwedere
